Name: Anger
Abilities: Play: Ready and fight with a friendly creature. (That creature may be from any house.)
Flavor: Don't make them angry you say? Heh. The Brobnar are born angry. -- Old Bruno

Name: Barehanded
Abilities: Play: Put each artifact on top of its owner's deck.

Name: Blood Money
Abilities: Play: Place 2[Æ] from the common supply on an enemy creature.
Flavor: You!  Æmber lover.  You're next.

Name: Brothers in Battle
Abilities: Play: Choose a creature. For the remainder of the turn, each friendly creature of that house can fight.

Name: Burn the Stockpile
Abilities: Play: If your opponent has 7[Æ] or more, they lose 4[Æ].
Flavor: If you can't protect it, you don't deserve it. -- Bigum Avalanche

Name: Champion's Challenge
Abilities: Play: Destroy each enemy creature except the most powerful enemy creature. Destroy each friendly creature except the most powerful friendly creature. Ready and fight with your remaining creature.

Name: Coward's End
Abilities: Play: Destroy each undamaged creature.  Gain 3 chains.

Name: Follow the Leader
Abilities: Play: For the remainder of the turn, each friendly creature may fight.

Name: Lava Ball
Abilities: Play: Deal 4[D] to a creature with 2[D] splash.
Flavor: Here...Catch!

Name: Loot the Bodies
Abilities: Play: For the remainder of the turn, gain 1[Æ] each time an enemy creature is destroyed.
Flavor: Loot the Bodies! Hit the Floor! Loot the Bodies! Hit the Floor! -- Brobnar War Chant

Name: Take that, Smartypants
Abilities: Play: Steal 2[Æ] if your opponent has 3 or more Logos cards in play.
Flavor: Them bots don't wear pants.  I carry spares.

Name: Punch
Abilities: Play: Deal 3[D] to a creature.
Flavor: Three for flinching.

Name: Relentless Assault
Abilities: Play: Ready and fight with up to 3 different friendly creatures, one at a time

Name: Smith
Abilities: Play: Gain 2[Æ] if you control more creatures than your opponent.

Name: Sound the Horns
Abilities: Play: Discard cards from the top of your deck until you either discard a Brobnar creature or run out of cards. If you discarded a Brobnar creature this way, put it into your hand.

Name: Tremor
Abilities: Play: Stun a creature and each of its neighbors.

Name: Unguarded Camp
Abilities: Play: For each creature you have in excess of your opponent, a friendly creature captures 1[Æ].  Each creature cannot capture more than 1[Æ] this way.

Name: Warsong
Abilities: Play: For the remainder of the turn, gain 1[Æ] each time a friendly creature fights.

Name: Autocannon
Abilities: Deal 1[D] to each creature after it enters play.

Name: Banner of Battle
Abilities: Each friendly creature gets +1 power.

Name: Cannon
Abilities: Action: Deal 2[D] to a creature.

Name: Gauntlet of Command
Abilities: Action: Ready and Fight with a friendly creature.
Flavor: I said 'take me to your leader' and got a fist to the face. -- Captain Val Jericho

Name: Iron Obelisk
Abilities: Your opponent's keys cost +1[Æ] for each friendly damaged Brobnar creature.

Name: Mighty Javelin
Abilities: Omni: Sacrifice Mighty Javelin. Deal 4[D] to a creature.

Name: Pile of Skulls
Abilities: Each time an enemy creature is destroyed during your turn, a friendly creature captures 1[Æ].

Name: Screechbomb
Abilities: Omni: Sacrifice Screechbomb. Your opponent loses 2[Æ].
Flavor: I think that thing made me deaf! "What?  I can't hear you!  I think that thing made me deaf!"

Name: The Warchest
Abilities: Action: Gain 1[Æ] for each enemy creature that was destroyed in a fight this turn.
Flavor: It doesn't matter what the treasure is, only how it was won.

Name: Bilgum Avalanche
Abilities: After you forge a key, deal 2[D] to each enemy creature.
Flavor: Some call her 'warleader.'  Some call her 'demon.'  I just call her 'avalanche.' -- Dodger

Name: Valdr
Abilities: Valdr deals +2[D] while attacking an enemy creature on the flank.  (The flank is either end of a player's battleline.)
Flavor: Gather that Æmber!  And you're welcome.

Name: Bumpsy
Abilities: Play: Your opponent loses 1[Æ]
Flavor: Whatever he doesn't like, he breaks.  He doesn't like anything.

Name: Earthshaker
Abilities: Play: Destroy each creature with power 3 or lower.
Flavor: Did you feel that?

Name: Firespitter
Abilities: Before Fight: Deal 1[D] to each enemy creature.
Flavor: Guess how he got that name.

Name: Ganger Chieftain
Abilities: Play: You may ready and fight with a neighboring creature. (That creature may be from any house.)
Flavor: It takes two to fight, but more is better.

Name: Grenade Snib
Abilities: Destroyed: You opponent loses 2[Æ].

Name: Headhunter
Abilities: Fight: Gain 1[Æ].
Flavor: I mean, I think it's a head...

Name: Hebe the Huge
Abilities: Play: Deal 2[D] to each other undamaged creature.
Flavor: He's much bigger in person.

Name: Kelifi Dragon
Abilities: Kelifi Dragon cannot be played unless you have 7[Æ] or more. Fight/Reap:  Gain 1[Æ].  Deal 5[D] to a creature.

Name: King of the Crag
Abilities: Each enemy Brobnar creature gets -2 power.
Flavor: Overthrowing the king is an uphill battle.

Name: Krump
Abilities: After an enemy creature is destroyed fighting Krump, its controller loses 1[Æ]

Name: Lomir Flamefist
Abilities: Play: If your opponent has 7[Æ] or more, they lose 2[Æ].
Flavor: I thought his name would turn out to be... metaphorical. - Quixo the "Adventurer"

Name: Looter Goblin
Abilities: Elusive.  (The first time this creature is attacked each turn, no damage is dealt.) Reap: Fir the remainder of the turn, gain 1[Æ] each time an enemy creature is destroyed.

Name: Mugwump
Abilities: After an enemy creature is destroyed fighting Mugwump, fully heal Mugwump and give it a +1 power counter.

Name: Pingle Who Annoys
Abilities: Elusive.  (The first time this creature is attacked each turn, no damage is dealt.) Deal 1[D] to each enemy creature after it enters play.

Name: Rock-Hurling Giant
Abilities: During your turn, each time you discard a Brobnar card from your hand, you may deal 4[D]   a creature.

Name: Rogue Ogre
Abilities: At the end of your turn, if you played exactly one card this turn, Rogue Ogre heals 2 damage and captures 1[Æ].
Flavor: I like to think of it as a Roguere. -- Dodger

Name: Smaaash
Abilities: Play: Stun a creature.
Flavor: I'm not sure he knows any other words.

Name: Tireless Crocag
Abilities: Tireless Crocag cannot reap. You may use Tireless Crocag as if it belonged to the active house. If your opponent has no creatures in play, Destroy Tireless Crocag.

Name: Troll
Abilities: Reap: Troll heals 3 damage.
Flavor: Don't feed it, it'll go away.

Name: Wardrummer
Abilities: Play: Return each other friendly Brobnar creature to your hand.

Name: Blood of Titans
Abilities: This creature gets +5 power.
Flavor: Blood of Giants? Why stop there? -- Pingle Who Annoys

Name: Phoenix Heart
Abilities: This creature gains, "Destroyed: Return this creature to it's owner's hand and deal 3[D] to each creature in play.

Name: Yo Mama Mastery
Abilities: This creature gains Taunt. Play: Fully heal this creature
Flavor: Yo' mama is so tiny...

Name: A Fair Game
Abilities: Play: Discard the top card or your opponent's deck and reveal their hand. You gain 1[Æ] for each card of the discarded card's house revealed in this way. Your opponent repeats the preceeding effect on you.

Name: Arise!
Abilities: Play: Choose a house.  Return each creature of that house from your discard pile to your hand.  Gain 1 chain.

Name: Control the Weak
Abilities: Play: Choose a house on your opponent's identity card. Your opponent must choose that house as their active house next turn.

Name: Creeping Oblivion
Abilities: Play: Purge up to 2 cards from a discard pile.
Flavor: As far as oblivions go, it's in my bottom three. -- Dr. Escotera.

Name: Dance of Doom
Abilities: Play: Choose a number.  Destroy each creature with power equal to that number.

Name: Fear
Abilities: Play: Return an enemy creature to its owner's hand.

Name: Gateway to Dis
Abilities: Play: Destroy each creature.  Gain 3 chains.

Name: Gongoozle
Abilities: Play: Deal 3[D] to a creature.  If it is not destroyed, its owner discards a random card from their hand.
Flavor: Just trying to understand these...'things' gives me a headache.

Name: Guilty Hearts
Abilities: Play: Destroy each creature with any [Æ] on it.
Flavor: C'mon, take it.  You know you want to.

Name: Hand of Dis
Abilities: Play: Destroy a creature that is not on a flank.
Flavor: Let me give you a hand...

Name: Hectacomb
Abilities: Play: Destroy each Dis creature.  Each player gains 1[Æ] for each creature they controlled that was destroyed this way.

Name: Tendrils of Pain
Abilities: Play:  Deal 1[D] to each creature.  Deal an additional 3[D] to each creature if your opponent forged a key on their previous turn.

Name: Hysteria
Abilities: Play: Return each creature to its owner's hand.
Flavor: Help, I can't stop this feeling!

Name: Key Hammer
Abilities: Play: If your opponent forged a key on their previous turn, unforge it. Your opponent gains 6[Æ].
Flavor: What time is it?

Name: Mind Barb
Abilities: Play: Your opponent discards a random card from their hand.

Name: Pandemonium
Abilities: Play: Each undamaged creature captures 1[Æ] from its opponent.

Name: Poltergeist
Abilities: Play: Use an artifact controlled by any player as if it were yours. Destroy that artifact.

Name: Red Hot Armor
Abilities: Play: Each enemy creature with armor loses all of its armor until the end of the turn and is dealt 1[D] for each point of armor lost this way.

Name: Three Fates
Abilities: Play: Destroy the 3 most powerful creatures.
Flavor: Destitution, Dereliction, and Defenestration.

Name: Annihilation Ritual
Abilities: When a creature would enter a discard pile from play, it is purged instead.

Name: Dominator Bubble
Abilities: Action: Use a friendly creature.
Flavor: I know I shouldn't'a nicket it, but 'twere so ... shiny. -- Noddy the Thief

Name: Key to Dis
Abilities: Omni: Sacrifice Key to Dis. Destroy each creature.

Name: Lash of Broken Dreams
Abilities: Action: Keys cost +3[Æ] during your opponent's next turn.
Flavor: At first, I thought that nothing could harm an Archon. -- Captain Val Jericho

Name: Library of the Damned
Abilities: Action: Archive a card.
Flavor: This place takes the idea of losing yourself in a boot to a whole new level. -- Doc Bockton

Name: Lifeward
Abilities: Omni: Sacrifice Lifeward.  You opponent cannot play creatures on their next turn.

Name: Sacrificial Altar
Abilities: Action: Purge a friendly Human creature from play.  If you do, play a creature from your discard pile.

Name: Screaming Cave
Abilities: Action: Shuffle your hand and discard pile into your deck.
Flavor: Was that you, or the cave? -- Captain Val Jericho

Name: Soul Snatcher
Abilities: Each time a creature is destroyed, its owner gains 1[Æ].
Flavor: No one goes in, no one comes out.  And yet the fires burn.

Name: Charette
Abilities: Play: Capture 3[Æ].
Flavor: It doesn't like to share.

Name: Drumble
Abilities: Elusive.  (The first time this creature is attacked each turn, no damage is dealt.) Play:  If your opponent has 7[Æ] or more, capture all of it.

Name: Dust Imp
Abilities: Destroyed: Gain 2[Æ].
Flavor: When the demon's away, the imps will play.

Name: Eater of the Dead
Abilities: Fight/Reap: Purge a creature from a discard pile.  If you do, put a +1 power counter on Eater of the Dead.

Name: Ember Imp
Abilities: Your opponent may not play more than 2 cards each turn

Name: Gabos Longarms
Abilities: Before Fight: Choose a creature. Gabos Longarms deals damage to that creature rather than the one it is fighting.

Name: Overlord Greking
Abilities: After an enemy creature is destroyed fighting Overlord Greking, put that creature into play under your control.

Name: Guardian Demon
Abilities: Play/Fight/Reap:  Heal up to 2 damage from a creature.  Deal that amount of damage to another creature.

Name: Master of 1
Abilities: Reap: You may destroy a creature with 1 power.
Flavor: The first sin is fear.

Name: Master of 2
Abilities: Reap: You may destroy a creature with 2 power.
Flavor: The second sin is apathy.

Name: Master of 3
Abilities: Reap: You may destroy a creature with 3 power.
Flavor: The third sin is greed.

Name: Pit Demon
Abilities: Action: Steal 1[Æ].
Flavor: They come from another world, they are pure evil made flesh and steel, and the lurk in the darkest corners of the land.  Yes, I'm comfortable calling them 'demons'" -- Science Officer Wu

Name: Pitlord
Abilities: Taunt (This creature's neighbors cannot be attacked unless they have taunt.) While Pitlord is in play, you must choose Dis as your active house.

Name: Restringuntus
Abilities: Play:  Choose a house.  Your opponent cannot choose that house as their active house until Restringuntus leaves play.

Name: Shaffles
Abilities: At the end of your turn, your opponent loses 1[Æ].
Flavor: Do you want imps?  This is how you get imps.

Name: Shooler
Abilities: Play: If your opponent has 4[Æ] or more, steal 1[Æ].
Flavor: Demons onle take, never give. -- The Sanctified Scroll

Name: Snudge
Abilities: Fight/Reap:  Return an artifact or flank creature to its owner's hand.
Flavor: It's only sensible to fear the dark.

Name: Stealer of Souls
Abilities: After an enemy creature is destroyed fighting Stealer of Souls, purge that creature and gain 1[Æ]. (A purged creature is removed from the game.)

Name: Succubus
Abilities: During the "draw cards" step, your opponent refils their hand to 1 less card.

Name: Tentacus
Abilities: You opponent must pay you 1[Æ] in order to use an artifact.

Name: The Terror
Abilities: Play: If your opponent has no [Æ], gain 2[Æ].
Flavor: I once thought that these creatures could be redeemed.  Now I know better. -- Champion Anaphiel

Name: Tocsin
Abilities: Reap: Your opponent discards a random card from their hand.

Name: Tolas
Abilities: Elusive. (The first time this creature is attacked each turn, no damage is dealt.) Each time a creature is destroyed, its opponent gains 1[Æ].

Name: Truebaru
Abilities: You must lose 3[Æ] in order to play Truebaru. Taunt. (This creature's neighbors cannot be attacked unless they have taunt.) Destroyed: Gain 5[Æ].

Name: Collar of Subordination
Abilities: You control this creature.
Flavor: OBEY

Name: Flame Wreathed
Abilities: This creature gets +2 power and gains hazardous 2.  (Before this creature is attacked, deal 2[D] to the attacking enemy.)

Name: Bouncing Deathquark
Abilities: Play: Destroy an enemy creature and a friendly creature. You may repeat this effect as many times as you like, as long as it is possible to repeat the entire effect.

Name: Dimension Door
Abilities: Play: For the remainder of the turn, any [Æ] you would gain from reaping is stolen from your opponent instead.

Name: Effervescent Principle
Abilities: Play: Each player loses half of their [Æ] (rounding down the loss).  Gain 1 chain.

Name: Foggify
Abilities: Play: Your opponent cannot use creatures to fight on their next turn.

Name: Help From Future Self
Abilities: Play: Search your deck and discard pile for a Timetraveller, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Shuffle your discard pile into your deck.

Name: Interdimensional Graft
Abilities: Play: If an opponent forges a key on their next turn, they must giveyou their remaning [Æ].

Name: Knowledge is Power
Abilities: Play: Choose one.  Archive a card, or, for each archived card you have, gain 1[Æ].

Name: Labwork
Abilities: Play: Archive a card.
Flavor: Attention to detail is the key to all progress.

Name: Library Access
Abilities: Play: For the remainder of the turn, each time you play another card, draw a card.

Name: Neuro Syphon
Abilities: Play: If your opponent has more [Æ] than you, steal 1[Æ] and draw a card.

Name: Phase Shift
Abilities: Play: You may play one non-Logos card this turn.

Name: Positron Bolt
Abilities: Play: Deal 3[D] to a flank creature.  Deal 2[D] to it's neighbor.  Deal 1[D] to the second creature's other neighbor.

Name: Random Access Archives
Abilities: Play: Archive the top card of your deck.
Flavor: 3.14159, Niffles, Monosodium Glutamate...

Name: Remote Access
Abilities: Play: Use an opponent's artifact as if it were yours.

Name: Reverse Time
Abilities: Play: Swap you deck and your discard pile.  Then, shuffle your deck.
Flavor: ...time back turn could I if

Name: Scrambler Storm
Abilities: Play: Your opponent cannot play actions on their next turn

Name: Sloppy Labwork
Abilities: Play: Archive a card. Discard a card
Flavor: Don't fret the details.  Progress happens when you least expect it.

Name: Twin Bolt Emission
Abilities: Play: Deal 2[D] to a creature, and deal 2[D] to a different creature

Name: Wild Wormhole
Abilities: Play: Play the top card of your deck
Flavor: But if we ever do recover the dataprobe, think of what we will learn!

Name: Anomaly Exploiter
Abilities: Action:  Destroy a damaged creature.

Name: Chaos Portal
Abilities: Action: Choose a house. Reveal the top card of your deck. If it is of that house, play it.

Name: Crazy Killing Machine
Abilities: Action: Discard the top card of each player's deck. For each of those cards, destroy a creature or artifact of that card's house, if able. If 2 cards are not destroyed as a result of this, destroy Crazy Killing Machine

Name: Library of Babble
Abilities: Action: Draw a card
Flavor: When you make an archive of all knowledge in the galaxy, don't be suprised when you understand almost none of it.

Name: Mobius Scroll
Abilities: Action: Archive the Mobius Scroll and up to 2 cards in your hand.
Flavor: Once upon a time there was a scroll that began:  Once upon a time ...

Name: Pocket Universe
Abilities: You may spend [Æ] from Pocket Universe when forging keys. Action: Move 1[Æ] from your pool to Pocket Universe.

Name: Spangler Box
Abilities: Action: Purge a creature in play. If you do, your opponent gains control of Spangler Box. If Spangler Box leaves play, return to play all cards purged by Spangler Box.

Name: Spectral Tunneler
Abilities: Action: Choose a creature.  For the remainder of the turn, that creature is considered a flank creature and gains, "Reap:  Draw a card."

Name: Strange Gizmo
Abilities: After you forge a key, destroy each creature and artifact.
Flavor: Why did we make this again?

Name: The Howling Pit
Abilities: During their "draw cards" step, each player refils their hand to 1 additional card.

Name: Batdrone
Abilities: Skirmish. (When you use this creature to fight, it is dealt no damage in return.) Fight: Steal 1[Æ].
Flavor: The worst part is the singing.

Name: Brain Eater
Abilities: After a creature is destroyed fighting Brain Eater, draw a card.

Name: Dextre
Abilities: Play: Capture 1[Æ]. Destroyed: Put Dextre on top of your deck.

Name: Doc Bookton
Abilities: Reap: Draw a card.
Flavor: Don't worry, Momo.  We'll have this quantum death ray installed in no time.

Name: Dr. Escotera
Abilities: Play: Gain 1[Æ] for each forged key your opponent has.
Flavor: Interesting reaction, but what does it mean?

Name: Dysania
Abilities: Play:  Your opponent discards each of their archived cards.  You gain 1[Æ] for each card discarded this way.

Name: Ganymede Archivist
Abilities: Reap: Archive a card.
Flavor: They offered to let my crew stay with them.  I politely declined.  -- Captain Val Jericho

Name: Harland Mindlock
Abilities: Play: Take control of an enemy flank creature until Harland Mindlock leaves play.

Name: Quixo the "Adventurer"
Abilities: Skirmish.  (When you use this creature to fight, it is dealt no damage in return.) Fight: Draw a card.
Flavor: ...I'll leave this part out of the memoir.

Name: Mother
Abilities: During your "draw cards" step, refill your hand to 1 additional card.
Flavor: Of course she's necessary, she's the mother of all invention!

Name: Neutron Shark
Abilities: Play/Fight/Reap:  Destroy an enemy creature or artifact and a friendly creature or artifact.  Discard the top card of your deck.  If that card is not a Logos card, trigger this effect again.

Name: Novu Archaeologist
Abilities: Action: Archive a card from your discard pile.
Flavor: One civilaztion's trash is ... nope, still trash.

Name: Ozmo, Martianologist
Abilities: Elusive. (The first time this creature is attacked each turn, no damage is dealt.) Fight/Reap:  Heal 3 damage from a Mars creature or stun a Mars creature.

Name: Psychic Bug
Abilities: Play/Reap: Look at your opponent's hand.
Flavor: I'd make more, but I descovered lesser minds aren't worth reading. -- Biologician Moreau

Name: Replicator
Abilities: Reap: Trigger the Reap effect of another creature in play as if you controlled that creature. (That creature does not exhaust.)

Name: Research Smoko
Abilities: Destroyed:  Archive the top card of your deck.

Name: Skippy Timehog
Abilities: Play: Your opponent cannot use any cards next turn.  (Cards can still be played and discarded.)

Name: Timetraveller
Abilities: Play: Draw 2 cards. Action: Shuffle Timetraveller into your deck.

Name: Titan Mechanic
Abilities: While Titan Mechanic is on a flank, each key costs -1[Æ].
Flavor: If they come, they will build it.

Name: Vespilon Theorist
Abilities: Elusive.  (The first time this creature is attacked each turn, no damage is dealt.) Reap: Choose a house.  Reveal the top card of your deck.  If it is of that house, archive it and gain 1[Æ].  Otherwise, discard it.

Name: Veylan Analyst
Abilities: Each time you use an artifact, gain 1 [Æ].
Flavor: Logos are divided into two camps: Theorists and Mechanists. Each believes themselves to be superior to the other.

Name: Experimental Therapy
Abilities: This creature belongs to all houses. Play:  Stun and exhaust this creature.
Flavor: This is for our research, so be honest.  How do you feel?

Name: Rocket Boots
Abilities: This creature gains, "Fight/Reap: If this is the first time this creature was used this turn, ready it."
Flavor: Wheeeee!

Name: Transposition Sandals
Abilities: This creature gains, "Action: Swap this creature with another friendly creature in the battleline.  You may use that other creature this turn."

Name: Ammonia Clouds
Abilities: Play: Deal 3[D] to each creature.
Flavor: Partly cloudy with a chance of acid rain.

Name: Battle Fleet
Abilities: Play: Reveal any number of Mars cards from your hand.  For each card revealed this way, draw 1 card.

Name: Deep Probe
Abilities: Play: Choose a house.  Reveal your opponent's hand.  Discard each creature of that house revealed this way.

Name: EMP Blast
Abilities: Play: Each Mars creature and each Robot creature is stunned. Each artifact is destroyed.

Name: Hypnotic Command
Abilities: Play: For each friendly Mars creature, choose an enemy creature to capture 1[Æ] from their own side.

Name: Irradiated Æmber
Abilities: Play: If your oppponent has 6[Æ] or more, deal 3[D] to each enemy creature.
Flavor: The poisned Mars.  We must not let them do the same here. -- Eldest Bear

Name: Key Abduction
Abilities: Play: Return each Mars creature to it's owner's hand.  Then, you may forge a key at +9[Æ] current cost, reduced bt 1[Æ] for each card in your hand.

Name: Martian Hounds
Abilities: Play: Choose a creature. For each damaged creature, give the chosen creature two +1 power counters
Flavor: Who let the... dogs?... out?

Name: Martians Make Bad Allies
Abilities: Play: Reveal your hand.  Purge each revealed non-Mars creature and gain 1[Æ] for each card purged this way.

Name: Mass Abduction
Abilities: Play: Put up to 3 damaged enemy creatures into your archives.  If any of these creatures leave your archives, they are put into their owner's hand instead.

Name: Mating Season
Abilities: Play: Shuffle each Mars creature into its owner's deck.  Each player gains 1[Æ] for each creature shuffled into their deck this way

Name: Mothership Support
Abilities: Play:  For each friendly ready Mars creature, deal 2[D] to a creature. (You may choose a different creature each time.)

Name: Orbital Bombardment
Abilities: Play: Reveal any number of Mars cards from your hand.  For each card revealed this way deal 2[D] to a creature. (You may choose a different creature each time.)

Name: Phosphorus Stars
Abilities: Play: Stun each non-Mars creature. Gain 2 chains.
Flavor: Martians love da smell of dis spice, but it remins me of Old Bruno's feet. -- Dodger

Name: Psychic Network
Abilities: Play: Steal 1[Æ] for each friendly ready Mars creature.

Name: Sample Collection
Abilities: Play: Put an enemy creature into your archives for each key your opponent has forged. If any of these creatures leave your archives, they are put into their owner's hand instead

Name: Shatter Storm
Abilities: Play: Lose all your [AE]. Then, your opponent loses triple the amount of [AE] you lost this way.
Flavor: It's working!

Name: Soft Landing
Abilities: Play: The next creature or artifact you play this turn enters play ready.
Flavor: Any landing you walk away from...

Name: Squawker
Abilities: Play: Ready a Mars creature or stun a non-Mars creature

Name: Total Recall
Abilities: Play: For each friendly ready creature, gain 1[Æ]. Return each friendly creature to your hand.

Name: Combat Pheromones
Abilities: Omni:  Sacrifice Combat Pheromones.  You may use up to 2 other Mars cards this turn.
Flavor: Don't worry, this will only sting a lot.

Name: Commpod
Abilities: Action: Reveal any number of Mars cards from your hand.  For each card revealed this way, you may ready one creature.

Name: Crystal Hive
Abilities: Action: For the remainder of the turn, gain 1[Æ] each time a creature reaps.
Flavor: Behold the glory of Nova Hellas!

Name: Custom Virus
Abilities: Omni: Sacrifice Custom Virus.  Purge a creature from your hand.  Destroy each creature that shares a trait with the purged creature.

Name: Feeding Pit
Abilities: Action: Discard a creature from your hand.  If you do, gain 1[Æ].

Name: Invasion Portal
Abilities: Action: Discard cards from the top of your deck until you discard a Mars creature or run out of cards.  If you discard a Mars creature this way, put it into your hand.

Name: Incubation Chamber
Abilities: Omni: Reveal a Mars creature from your hand. If you do, archive it.
Flavor: Most Martians on the Crucible came out of one of these tanks.

Name: Mothergun
Abilities: Action: Reveal any number of Mars cards from your hand.  Deal damage to a creature equal to the number of cards revealed this way

Name: Sniffer
Abilities: Action: For the remainder of the turn, each creature loses elusive.
Flavor: Even the Martians' pets have a bone to pick with other life forms on the Crucible.

Name: Swap Widget
Abilities: Action: Return a ready friendly Mars creature to your hand.  If you do, put a Mars creature with a different name from your hand into play, then ready it.

Name: Blypyp
Abilities: Reap: The next Mars creature you play this turn enters play ready
Flavor: Soooon...

Name: Chuff Ape
Abilities: Taunt. (This creature;s neighbors cannot be attacked unless they have taunt.) Chuff Ape enters play stunned. Fight/Reap: You may sacrifice another friendly creature.  If you do, fully heal Chuff Ape.

Name: Ether Spider
Abilities: Ether Spider deals no damage when fighting. Each [Æ] which would be added to your opponent's pool is captured by Ether Spider instead.

Name: Grabber Jammer
Abilities: Your opponent's keys cost +1[Æ]. Fight/Reap: Capture 1[Æ].
Flavor: Mine!

Name: Grommid
Abilities: You cannot play creatures. After an enemy creature is destroyed fighting Grommid, your opponent loses 1[Æ].

Name: John Smyth

Name: Mighty Lance

Flavor: An object, no matter how sacred, is just a thing.

Flavor: All my skill in battle brings me not one step closer to enlightenment.

Name: Key Charge

Name: Lifeweb
Abilities: Play:  If your opponent played 3 or more creatures on their previous turn, steal 2[Æ].

Name: Save the Pack

Name: The Common Cold

Name: Ancient Bear

Name: Flaxia

Name: Fuzzy Gruen
Abilities: Play: Your opponent gains 1[Æ].

Name: Mighty Tiger

Name: Murmook

Name: Teliga
